scenario_text.value:
I just noticed this half-eaten snack on the
ground by this <color=#B41919>treasure chest</color>.

Th-that’s just left over from the snack I had
earlier!

So you just stopped to have a snack while all
this was going on?

D-don’t make it sound so bad! You can’t help
it when you’re hungry, can you?

I’m super, super busy right now, so I don’t
want you bothering me! Go away!
(She kicked us out of the room...)

Th-that half-eaten snack was mine! Really,
believe me, it was!
